data.text: @meghna_mj77 Honestly I was too...but only till I actually heard how Harshad said it...warna tag me sub ne dara diya tha :p there was nothing out of ordinary in how he said, any actor would say the same thing...
@JuwairiyaF Really appreciate the efforts behind this thread. While a part of me would still be somewhat fearful, this certainly provided some relief. You made a lot of sense! :) #bepannaah
@miliyaraea On Monday, it was Harshad’s pic posted for Monday mood, and today also AdiYa pic posted. And TRP for this slot is not bad. Even shows with below 1 TRP have ran longer than this

@miliyaraea Also, Bepannaah is a mystery series, do you know how secret GOT is kept before it airs? No promos mean they just want to saver the mystery. Rhi baat promotion ki, I dont think there’s any shortage of it...
@miliyaraea The channel will suffer more than they’d gain if they pulled the plug on Bepannah. With an online following such as ours, they cant risk this huge backlash!

Any time that an actor would be asked off air question, you’d always find them confused. Not because the rumours have any worth, but cuz they have no control in the matter, and they can never agree or deny fully without knowing something a 100% #Bepannaah

...reconfirm it from producers director right there and then, which made them confident in their answer. While here, Harshad was caught off guard, maybe he hadn’t found the time to discuss it with the makers to give a confident answer. I don’t think there’s anything to worry...

..the point is, actors dont control these things, &have no knowledge or say in a show coming or going. Thats why when an actor is asked such a question, he/she can never be a 100% confident. Last time, #JenShad were on sets when off air question was asked, so they could...

..the blatant authenticity of articles made PHEOBE, a vital part of the show believe that a movie was really coming out, &she was not told about it, cuz she wont be a part of it. So in her confused state, when asked about the rumours, she had a weird diplomatic answer...
